import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useStore } from '../store'; import { useAuth } from '../store/auth'; import { SkillTagList } from '../components/ui/skill-tag'; import { CapacityBar } from '../components/ui/capacity-bar'; import { SeniorityBadge } from '../components/ui/seniority-badge'; function Engineers() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { engineers, loading, fetchEngineers } = useStore(); const { isManager } = useAuth(); React.useEffect(() => { fetchEngineers(); }, [fetchEngineers]); return (

Engineering Team

Manage and view team member profiles

{loading ? (
) : (
{engineers.map((engineer) => (

{engineer.name}

{engineer.email}

Skills & Expertise
Employment Type {engineer.employmentType === 'full-time' ? 'Full-time (100%)' : 'Part-time (50%)'}
Current Capacity

{engineer.availableCapacity}% Available

{isManager() && (
)}
))}
)}
); } export default Engineers;
